system.description: The individual has training and skill in the medical arts and sciences, from diagnosis and triage to surgery and other corrective treatments. This skill represents a character's ability to provide emergency care, short term care, long-term care, and specialized treatment for diseases, poisons and debilitating injuries. When treating a patient of a race other than their own, the character suffers a -2 DM.
system.shortdescr: The individual has training and skill in the medical arts and sciences, from diagnosis and triage to surgery and other corrective treatments.
system.name: Medicine
